projects.name: Dealer Management System – DriveFlex – North America
projects.description:
Dealer Management System –DMS in North America has been serving all the automobile dealerships with selling vehicles starting from First Point of Contact ( F & I Manager ) till Salvage the car.
It consists of deep and complex rules of automobile industry and make dealers selling more car efficiently and manage the complete workflow.
It has Sales, Parts, Service, accounting and OEM (Original Engine Manufactures) solution which help dealers in various stages of the vehicle sale

projects.name: Computerised Vehicle Registration – CVR – North America
projects.description: Computerized Vehicle Registration (CVR) is the electronic vehicle registration application.  It performs various transactions such as Title Registration, Duplicate title, Renewal, transfer, Substitute tag, substitute registration, duplicate registration, temporary tag etc. It can perform the vehicle enquiries where it fetches the vehicle information from the DMV (department of motor vehicle).

projects.name: Disney’s EMEA Channel Management System
projects.description:
I have worked for “The Walt Disney Pvt ltd, UK” client in the Studio Business Solution System – Apollo Studio Solution as Automation Test Analyst.
The Apollo application is one of the major applications of Disney, It provides day to day Monitoring all the Studio Business Updates and provides monitoring deals and Products of Disney’s Studios. This application also includes Business Objects for reporting functions.
As a team member of Apollo application, I need to Provide Test scripts for most of the functionalities such as reports of Apollo processes, output, analysing the issues, fix the bugs of Test Scripts, releasing the changes into production environment

basics.personalDescription:
•	Having 8+ years of IT experience as a Software Developer .
•	Proficiency with ReactJS, Redux,ContextApi, Redux-Saga, JavaScript, Jquery & other JS frameworks/Library
•	Sound understanding of front-end technologies, such as HTML5 , CSS and CSS Preprocessors – LESS,SASS.
•	Experienced with UI Mono-Repo Architecuture and management using Lerna
•	Hands on with UI Unit Testing using Jest, Enzyme, Chai , Mocha, BDD Testing using Should.js & E2E using NightWatch.js and Cyprus.
•	Profient in Asynchronous Javascript and fundamentals
•	Hands on experience on Microsoft .Net environment using C# , RestAPIs and WCF Services.
•	Experienced User Design Developer ( UX Design course from Interaction Design Foundation - IDF )
•	Hands on knowledge Sql and MongoDB  
•	Experienced as a ALM/Build DevOps Engineer , set up CI-CD Pipelines using Atlassian tool set and Microsoft TFS stack Pipeline
•	Hands on Release management using Atlassian Bamboo CI/CD,Container Technologies – Docker, Kubernetes,
•	Hands on DevOps Automation tools such as Ansible, Nolio, TerraForms etc
•	Hands on experience on Cloud technologies using AWS – Hosting using EC2,Storage - S3 , Content Delivery Network – CloudFront, Latest WebServers such Ngnix, IIS along with F5 load balancer.
•	Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git , TFS and respective workflows.
•	Agile Scrum master and follows Agile process by the rules.
•	Played On-Site Corginator  role to Off site india team while working for Client Disney - London
•	Having Knowledge on Android and iOS Apps development using Flutter
•	Understanding fundamental design principles behind a scalable application.
•	Experienced in working with integrated teams like QA.
